languages.text: "И чтобы {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}пообещать помощь{/d}. Ступай смело, церковь святого Друза позаботится о вере твоих подданных. Ты есть один из столпов веры Простора, и посему негоже отпускать тебя в топи богомерзкой тьмы меж звездами без дара. Иные, меньшие подношения будут доставлены на твой корабль, чтобы в странствии не ведал{mf||а} ты нехватки ни в чем".

"And to {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}pledge my help{/d}. Go forth without fear. The Cult of Saint Drusus will watch over your subjects' faith. You are one of the pillars of faith in the Expanse, and thus it would not be appropriate to see you off to the ungodly dark morass between the stars without a gift. Other and lesser offerings will be delivered to your ship, so that you may have no want of anything on your journey."
languages.original_text: "И чтобы {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}пообещать помощь{/d}. Ступай смело, церковь святого Друза позаботится о вере твоих подданных. Ты есть один из столпов веры Простора, и посему негоже отпускать тебя в топи богомерзкой тьмы меж звездами без дара. Иные, меньшие подношения будут доставлены на твой корабль, чтобы в странствии не ведал{mf||а} ты нехватки ни в чем".

traits.locale_text: "And to pledge my help. Go on with no fear. The Church of Saint Drusus will take care of your subjects' faith. You are one of the pillars of faith in the Koronus, and thus it would not be appropriate to see you off to the ungodly dark morass between the stars without a gift. Other and lesser offerings will be delivered to your ship, so that you may have no want of anything on your journey."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "And to pledge my help. Go on with no fear. The Church of Saint Drusus will take care of your subjects' faith. You are one of the pillars of faith in the Koronus, and thus it would not be appropriate to see you off to the ungodly dark morass between the stars without a gift. Other and lesser offerings will be delivered to your ship, so that you may have no want of anything on your journey."

You are one of the pillars of faith in the Koronus, and thus it would not be appropriate to see you off to the ungodly dark morass between the stars without a gift. You are one of the pillars of faith in the Expanse, and thus it would not be appropriate to see you off to the ungodly dark morass between the stars without a gift. traits.locale_text: "And to {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}pledge my help{/d}. Go forth without fear. The Cult of Saint Drusus will watch over your subjects' faith. You are one of the pillars of faith in the Expanse, and thus it would not be appropriate to see you off to the ungodly dark morass between the stars without a gift. Other and lesser offerings will be delivered to your ship, so that you may have no want of anything on your journey."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: “当然，我还是要为你{d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}提供帮助{/d}。请放心前行吧，圣德鲁苏斯教会会保障臣民们的信仰。你是科罗努斯扩区的信仰支柱，因此，如果我们不为你提供礼物，就让你这么踏上前往黑暗群星的旅途，那恐怕就太不合适了。我们会把其他礼物送到你的飞船上，保障您这场旅途在物资方面不会遇到任何匮乏。”
languages.original_text: "And to {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}pledge my help{/d}. Go forth without fear. The Cult of Saint Drusus will watch over your subjects' faith. You are one of the pillars of faith in the Expanse, and thus it would not be appropriate to see you off to the ungodly dark morass between the stars without a gift. Other and lesser offerings will be delivered to your ship, so that you may have no want of anything on your journey."

traits.locale_text: “当然，我还要为你提高帮助。请翻新前行吧，圣德鲁苏斯教会会保障臣民们的信仰。你是科罗努斯扩区的信仰支柱，因此，如果我们不为你提供礼物，就让你这么踏上前往黑暗群星的旅途，那恐怕就抬不合适了。我们会把其他礼物送到你的飞船上，保障这场旅途的物资不会有任何匮乏。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: 「そして私の{d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}助力を誓う{/d}事。恐れずに進みなさい。聖ドルスス教団はあなたの臣民の信仰を見守ります。あなたはエクスパンスの信仰の柱の一人です。贈り物もせず星々の間の邪悪で暗黒な泥沼へ見送る事は出来ません。あなたに旅の間苦労をさせないための他のささやかな贈り物は、あなたの船に積み込まれるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "And to {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}pledge my help{/d}. Go forth without fear. The Cult of Saint Drusus will watch over your subjects' faith. You are one of the pillars of faith in the Expanse, and thus it would not be appropriate to see you off to the ungodly dark morass between the stars without a gift. Other and lesser offerings will be delivered to your ship, so that you may have no want of anything on your journey."

traits.locale_text: 「そして私の{d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}助力を誓う{/d}事。恐れずに進みなさい。聖ドルスス教団はあなたの臣民の信仰を見守ります。あなたはエクスパンスの信仰の柱の一人です。贈り物もせず星々の間の邪悪で暗黒な泥沼へ見送る事は出来ません。あなたに旅の間苦労をさせないための他のささやかな贈り物は、あなたの船に積み込まれるでしょう」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: «Y para {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}prometerle mi ayuda{/d}. Avance sin miedo. El Culto de San Drusus cuidará de la fe de sus súbditos. Es usted uno de los pilares de la fe en la Extensión, por lo que no sería apropiado despedir{mf|le|la} sin un regalo. Para que no le falte de nada, haremos llegar otras ofrendas a su nave.».
languages.original_text: "And to {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}pledge my help{/d}. Go forth without fear. The Cult of Saint Drusus will watch over your subjects' faith. You are one of the pillars of faith in the Expanse, and thus it would not be appropriate to see you off to the ungodly dark morass between the stars without a gift. Other and lesser offerings will be delivered to your ship, so that you may have no want of anything on your journey."

traits.locale_text: «Y para prometerle mi ayuda. Continúe sin miedo. La iglesia de San Drusus cuidará de la fe de sus súbditos. Es usted uno de los pilares de la fe en Koronus, por lo que no sería apropiado despedir{mf|le|la} sin un regalo. Para que no le falte de nada, haremos llegar otras ofrendas a su nave.».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Und um {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}meine Hilfe anzubieten{/d}. Zieht ohne Angst aus. Der Kult des Heiligen Drusus wird sich um den Glauben Eurer Untertanen kümmern. Ihr seid eine der Glaubenssäulen in der Ausdehnung, da geziemt es sich nicht, Euch ohne ein Geschenk in den gottlosen dunklen Morast zwischen den Sternen ziehen zu lassen. Andere, geringere Gaben werden auf Euer Schiff gebracht, damit es Euch auf Eurer Reise an nichts mangelt."
languages.original_text: "And to {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}pledge my help{/d}. Go forth without fear. The Cult of Saint Drusus will watch over your subjects' faith. You are one of the pillars of faith in the Expanse, and thus it would not be appropriate to see you off to the ungodly dark morass between the stars without a gift. Other and lesser offerings will be delivered to your ship, so that you may have no want of anything on your journey."

traits.locale_text: "Und um meine Hilfe anzubieten. Zieht ohne Sorge los. Die Kirche des Heiligen Drusus wird sich um den Glauben Eurer Untertanen kümmern. Ihr seid eine der Glaubenssäulen in der Koronus, da geziemt es sich nicht, Euch ohne ein Geschenk in den gottlosen dunklen Morast zwischen den Sternen ziehen zu lassen. Andere, geringere Gaben werden auf Euer Schiff gebracht, damit es Euch auf Eurer Reise an nichts mangelt."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: « Et pour {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}vous assurer de mon soutien{/d}. Allez sans peur ; le Culte de Saint Drusus se chargera d'entretenir la foi de vos sujets. Puisque vous êtes l'un des piliers de la foi dans les Étendues, il serait malvenu de ne pas vous offrir de cadeau alors que vous vous apprêtez à braver les ténèbres impies entre les étoiles. D'autres offrandes seront livrées directement à bord de votre vaisseau, afin que vous ne manquiez de rien pour ce voyage. »
languages.original_text: "And to {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}pledge my help{/d}. Go forth without fear. The Cult of Saint Drusus will watch over your subjects' faith. You are one of the pillars of faith in the Expanse, and thus it would not be appropriate to see you off to the ungodly dark morass between the stars without a gift. Other and lesser offerings will be delivered to your ship, so that you may have no want of anything on your journey."

traits.locale_text: « Et pour vous assurer de mon soutien. Allez sans peur ; l'Église de Saint Drusus se chargera d'entretenir la foi de vos sujets. Puisque vous êtes l'un des piliers de la foi dans les Étendues, il serait malvenu de ne pas vous offrir de cadeau alors que vous vous apprêtez à braver les ténèbres impies entre les étoiles. D'autres offrandes seront livrées directement sur votre vaisseau, afin que vous ne manquiez de rien pour ce voyage. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Bir de {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}yardım sözü vermek{/d}. Hiç korkmadan yola çık. Aziz Drusus Tarikatı, tebaasının inancını gözetecek. Sen Enginlik'teki inanç simgelerinden birisin ve bu yüzden de seni yıldızların arasındaki tanrıtanımaz, karanlık bataklığa armağansız göndermek uygun olmazdı. Yolculuğun sırasında herhangi bir şeye ihtiyaç duymaman için daha önemsiz başka adaklar da gemine gönderilecek."
languages.original_text: "And to {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}pledge my help{/d}. Go forth without fear. The Cult of Saint Drusus will watch over your subjects' faith. You are one of the pillars of faith in the Expanse, and thus it would not be appropriate to see you off to the ungodly dark morass between the stars without a gift. Other and lesser offerings will be delivered to your ship, so that you may have no want of anything on your journey."

traits.locale_text: "Ve de {d|Encyclopedia:DrusiansRep_Max}yardım sözü vermek{/d}. Hiç korkmadan yola çık. Aziz Drusus Tarikatı, tebaalarının inancını gözetecek. Sen Enginlik'teki inanç simgelerinden birisin ve bu yüzden de seni yıldızların arasındaki tanrı tanımaz karanlık bataklığa bir armağan vermeden göndermek uygun olmazdı. Yolculuğun sırasında herhangi bir şeye ihtiyaç duymaman için daha önemsiz diğer adaklar da gemine gönderilecek."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian
